name: Stingray City
lyric:
Turtle bob is a friend of mine

He likes to frolic in the warm sunshine

He could play in lime tree bay all day

Just off the coast of his island in the sun

Is the perfect place for turtle bob to have some fun

He gets around from north sound to bodden town

But his favorite place to go is
Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore

Coral gardens and a sandbar too

Come on down so turtle bob can swim with you
Beneath the surface it's a festival down there

A party atmosphere without any air
He beats the heat with a cool calypso beat

No workin hard like banana man

He'd rather build castles in the sand

Or swim in the blue green caribbean

But his favorite place to go is
Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore

Coral gardens and a sandbar too

Come on down so turtle bob can swim with you

Having fun and swimming with the rays

Is the most exciting part of bob's entire day

He's got no troubles he's too busy blowing lots of little bubbles

Sometimes when he's not swimming in the sea

Turtle bob relaxes in a tropical breeze

He likes to dance in the sand to a steel drum band

But his favorite place to go is
Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore

Coral gardens and a sandbar too

Come on down so turtle bob can swim with you

But his favorite place to go is

Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore

Coral gardens and a sandbar too

Come on down so turtle bob can swim with you

Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore
Coral gardens and a sandbar too

Come on down so turtle bob can swim with you
Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore

Coral gardens and a sandbar too

Come on down so turtle bob can swim with you
Stingray city on the ocean floor

With friendly fish and a reef to explore

Coral gardens and a sandbar too
